column4: I'm about to install ubuntu i think, but there's 2 issues. 1: I already have Windows and I don't have room for a new partition and 2: Not sure if I should choose 32 or 64 bit
gparted can usually resize NTFS, but be sure to take a backup in case you need to restore
use gparted in the livecd. you cant resize while running windows anyways
